text: Ten homes participate for one month saving electricity.  The winner gets a prize as well as the coveted "BIGGEST GREENIE" title.

attachments.title: The Biggest Greenie Saved The Most Electricity

attachments.text: Coach is always around to give you hints and tricks.  Just type `/coach`
attachments.title: Meet Your Coach

attachments.text: A new game starts the first Monday of the Month.
attachments.title: New Game Starts

attachments.text: We install an energy monitor the week before the game begins.  This way you can track your energy use.  It takes less than 15 minutes to install.
attachments.title: Install
